ygData.subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Druid Magic
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I ve been kiting just fine in Kunark (Lake of Ill Omen) since 14.  At 17 it s still great; I think I could stay here through early 20 s but I ll need to
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I've been kiting just fine in Kunark (Lake of Ill Omen)
since 14. At 17 it's still great; I think I could stay here through
early 20's but I'll need to leave to get my 19 spells.

--Ephemeris of Torvonnilous
----- Original Message -----
From: "Skinner, Rosalind A" <Rozi_Dozi@...>
To: <_EQ_Magic@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 27, 2000 9:23 AM
Subject: RE: [_EQ_Magic] Druid Magic


> You best bet is to group up until you reach 19....that is when you'll
really
> be able to solo.
>
> Then you can kite
>
> I kited Griffawn's in NK and Aviaks in SK and rathe...a GREAT place for
you
> to be is Lake Rathe...until about 24
>
> At 24ish, head out to Kunark..
>
> I'm level 32 now and I'm still on Kunark...non stop fun there..I can kite
> giants in FM or group up...
>
> Soril
> level 32 Druid
> Tunare
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Rhodes [mailto:mrhodes@...]
> Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 11:35 AM
> To: _EQ_Magic@egroups.com
> Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Druid Magic
>
>
> Hi Everyone...
> I'm not sure how people are on this list, I even forgot that I was
> on it
> until the last thread showed up!
>
> My question is this: I have a lvl 16 Druid, and I'm up to date on all my
> spells, but I often don't use them like I should. Does anyone out there
> have any tips on what spells are good for soloing? Another unrelated
> question..... Does anyone here know where a good place to hunt solo would
> be? I'm having a difficult time finding decent places to go without
getting
> killed.
>
> Thanks for an tips in advance...
>
> Mike
>
> Kyena 16th Circle
> The Nameless
>
